TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {111374=I love it. I've only gone there for two semesters over a year ago but I love the teachers. I'm currently enrolling in the Fall 2012 semester to finish my degree, 131046=Henry Ford is an excellent school with helpful and knowledgeable teachers. I have enjoyed the last 3 years I have spent there and look forward to the next 2 years I will spend in the nursing program. I expect to graduate with my RN in December 2013., 196382=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Manage your time wisely Tips for prospective students Make the best of your education. In three sentences HFCC is overall a great school to attend. The professors are very helpful when it comes to getting the information you need as a student. I would say that HFCC is one of the best community colleges in Michigan. Login to rate or flag the reviews Jasmine from Detroit, MI 05/29/2012 Reviewer is A past student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 52 Categories Comments Campus Safety The campus is pretty safe and well lit. If something is going on or seems suspicious, the school will alert students. Also, campus safety will walk you to your car if you want them to. Great for these types of students Henry Ford has a lot of programs. It's a great school for: -Nursing & Other Health Related Careers -Computer Information
